short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate tips with just a click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is Tip calculator which calculates the standardized (general) tipping percentages based on the bill amount. Installing it can make tipping easier, and with the variety of options, it's just a step ahead.
